content: crochet the cutest handmade **christmas amigurumi baubles** to decorate your christmas tree this set of crochet christmas baubles includes 1 simple bauble 2 christmas pudding bauble 3 gingerbread man bauble 4 snowman bauble 5 reindeer bauble 6 gnome bauble 7 bear bauble *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 2 75-mm c/2 usa 12 uk crochet hook dk 3 light yarn tapestry needle stuffing 6 safety eyes 6 mm **yarn** i used paintbox yarns cotton dk 137 yds 125 m per 50 g in the following colors **brown** coffee bean 411 **light brown** soft fudge 410 **red** pillar red 415 **white** champagne white 403 **cream** vanilla cream 408 **light green** lime green 429 **dark green** grass green 430 **pink** blush pink 454 **blue** sailor blue 440 **black** pure black 402 **light grey** stormy grey 405 **orange** blood orange 420 **yellow** mustard yellow 424 feel free to use any yarn with the appropriate hook **size** 2 3 5 9 cm in diameter **gauge** these patterns are too small to determine the gauge accurately **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
